condition: [OR]([EQ](<*CTX( Quote.CustomField(Quote Type) )*>,Contract Renewal),[EQ](<*CTX( Quote.CustomField(Quote Type) )*>,Contract New))
name: One_time_upgrade_Visiblity
action: [IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Quote.CustomField(Quote Type) )*>,Contract Renewal)){<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(One time upgrade)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(One time upgrade)*>}[ENDIF]
